title: Short Test 1
subject: SocialStudies
description: This is a model ECZ Grade 7 Social Studies paper. It covers Zambian history, civic education, governance, and geography. Includes comprehension, diagrams, and application questions.

title: Grade 7 Social Studies Mock Exam 2
subject: SocialStudies
description: Second model ECZ Grade 7 Social Studies paper. Focuses on heritage, governance, environmental issues, and map skills. Includes multiple-choice and open-ended questions.
